name: wordsbattle
0:
”Alexa, open words battle”
”Alexa, start words battle”
”Alexa, launch words battle”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: words battle
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Compete with your friends to guess a word that starts with a specific letter in various categories!

Compete head to head against other sharp-minded players across the country or challenge your friends and family in live competitions! Show your mastery in remembering words to the world.

Worlds battle is for adults and children over the age of 13 only. While we do our best efforts to keep the game family-oriented and safe for youngers, please consult with our “Terms of Use” in advance.

A perfect game for learning new words and for kids and adults to have fun and enjoy your moments together. 

Just say Alexa, start Words Battle and the game will be started!

Multiplayer mode is a perfect ice-breaker for parties and gatherings. You can play with up to 100 players!

With thousands of words, Words Battle promises to provide heaps of fun and learning for audiences of all ages. 

Instructions

Words Battle is a game where you compete with others to find a word in a category that starts with a specific letter. You find a word in each category and Alexa counts your score. 

To start Words Battle you just need to say: Alexa, start Words Battle.

Words Battle is brought to you by Logic Labs LLC - the developer of fun Alexa games. 

Terms of Use: http://www.logiclabs.ai/games/words-battle/terms-of-use/
Privacy Policy: http://www.logiclabs.ai/games/words-battle/privacy-policy/
FAQ: http://www.logiclabs.ai/games/words-battle/frequently-asked-question/

Got a cool new category?

Tell us the new category that you’d like to see in the game and we’ll try our best to add it to the game! Please send us an email to feedback@logiclabs.ai 

Feedback

Please leave us a review and help us to continue supporting the game. If you face any problems with Words Battle please let us know your feedback at feedback@logiclabs.ai and we’ll do everything we can to make it better. 

Even send us an email just to become friends. We would like to hear from you, thanks!
